channel.title: MacOS on OwnBlog from DimiG
channel.description: Recent content in MacOS on OwnBlog from DimiG

item.title: MAC-OS cloning
item.description: Recently I had a task to clone the Mac OS operating system with some pre-installed software to other Mac Pro computers with almost same hardware configuration. To do it directly (Install OS, Install all necessary software) to every unit takes a lot of time. So, I have decided to install one unit and after clone it to other ones. Here I will describe the methods I have used.
